title: Woolen goods
brief_description: Traces the sources of wool; contrasts methods of shering, cvarding, spinning and waving homespun and factory-made woollens; and follows through the operation involved in making an overcoat from the preliminary testing of the fabrics to the final pressing of the coat and its sale.
description: Traces the sources of wool; contrasts methods of shering, cvarding, spinning and waving homespun and factory-made woollens; and follows through the operation involved in making an overcoat from the preliminary testing of the fabrics to the final pressing of the coat and its sale.
